description.value:
This pamphlet-sized book records the various symbols seen on fulu and also contains some ready-made magic on a special page that restores itself every day at sunrise. Using the compendium as a reference grants a +2 item bonus to any skill checks to determine a fulu's function or authenticity.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You rip a page from the fulu compendium and cast it in a wide arc; as it flies in that arc, it multiplies into a storm of fulus. All undead creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] are affected by a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spirit-Sealing Fulu]{Spirit-Sealing Fulu} with a @Check[type:will|dc:25|name:spirit-sealing fulu|traits:fulu|showDC:all] save DC of 25.
